name: Routinely
description:
Note: The game will prompt for a name at the start. If you choose to cancel, it will default to MC. If you wish to change the name, restart the game before proceeding.

A short interactive fiction based on the infamous red ribbon ending in Jumin Han's route (Mystic Messenger). Best played in landscape mode if playing on mobile.  Your choices will affect the narrative.

  • Choice-based interactive fiction
  • 7,500+ words in total
  • Three main endings, one bad end

Jumin Han (C) Cheritz.

(If you like my work, consider supporting me on Ko-fi!)
